events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return the item and get a full refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The customer's request was identified as a refund issue based on their message describing a return and refund request.
The case was assigned to support agent Maria, who handles refund and return requests for customer orders.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your item and get a refund. I'm happy to assist you with this process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can initiate the refund procedure for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the item doesn't fit as expected even though it looked good in the pictures.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your return request and arranged for a pickup. You will receive a full refund once we receive the item back.
Thanks for the quick response. That sounds great, I appreciate your help in making this process easy.
Your return is now scheduled, and the refund will be processed after the item is picked up. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have successfully returned your item and received your refund. Please contact us if thereâ€™s anything else we can assist with.
As your refund has been completed successfully and you have no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
